alert.note: Alert for Butte, Blackfoot Region; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued October 22 at 1:34PM MDT until October 25 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 12 inches possible. * WHERE...Homestake Pass, Highway 12 Garrison to Elliston, MacDonald Pass, Butte,Georgetown Lake, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth, and Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Butte, Blackfoot Region; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region
